timeline.message:
Change privilege of enrich stats API to monitor (#52027)

The remote_monitoring_user user needs to access the enrich stats API.
But the request is denied because the API is categorized under admin.
The correct privilege should be monitor.
Add tests for changed action privileges
Add bwc for old action names
Add smoke test for enrich stats API for mixed cluster
Update version selector for yaml tests
